e6f4229ef5f582df0969e7b9ab569ba3b7e9e7e4.commit.message:
Use internal methods when loading and saving a PropertiesConfiguration instance.

This avoids that for each property to be loaded or saved the configuration's
synchronizer is invoked.

e6f4229ef5f582df0969e7b9ab569ba3b7e9e7e4.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

f421ccca7ce5ecf4701ddf789fc2d0330575a922.commit.message:
Reworked SubnodeConfiguration to use a Synchronizer.

A SubnodeConfiguration per default shares its Synchronizer with its parent
because both configurations operate on the same node set. In the past
SubnodeConfiguration instances created with a subnode key (for detecting
structural changes of its parent) checked their root nodes on each read
access. Now such checks are performed when the parent configuration is
changed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481154 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
f421ccca7ce5ecf4701ddf789fc2d0330575a922.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger
